001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DbConfig;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DbConfigHolder;
006
007import static io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DbConfigHolder.getDbConfig;
008
009/**
010 * Represents a database query and provides configuration details.
011 *
012 * <p>This interface defines a structured way to execute database queries,
013 * retrieve their configurations, and apply parameterized values dynamically.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017public interface DbQuery<T extends Enum<T>> {
018
019   /**
020    * Retrieves the raw query string.
021    *
022    * @return The SQL query as a {@code String}.
023    */
024   String query();
025
026   /**
027    * Provides the database configuration associated with this query.
028    *
029    * <p>The configuration is fetched from {@link DbConfigHolder}, ensuring
030    * consistency across database queries.
031    *
032    * @return The {@link DatabaseConfiguration} for the query.
033    */
034   default DatabaseConfiguration config() {
035      DbConfig dbConfig = getDbConfig();
036      return DatabaseConfiguration.builder()
037            .dbType(dbConfig.type())
038            .host(dbConfig.host())
039            .port(dbConfig.port())
040            .database(dbConfig.name())
041            .dbUser(dbConfig.username())
042            .dbPassword(dbConfig.password())
043            .fullConnectionString(dbConfig.fullConnectionString())
044            .build();
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Retrieves the enum representation of the query implementation.
049    *
050    * @return The query's enum representation.
051    */
052   T enumImpl();
053
054   /**
055    * Applies a parameter to the query dynamically.
056    *
057    * <p>This method replaces placeholders within the query with actual values,
058    * allowing parameterized SQL execution.
059    *
060    * @param name  The name of the parameter to replace.
061    * @param value The value to assign to the parameter.
062    * @return A new {@code DbQuery} instance with the applied parameter.
063    */
064   default DbQuery<T> withParam(String name, Object value) {
065      return new ParametrizedQuery<>(this).withParam(name, value);
066   }
067}
